Text.val: 01.03.2013 GB SCR17935 Added copy the xml file from dir 26 to dir 20
27.07.2012 GB SCR 17284 Changed name of csv file and picture of amount
-- Copy the xml file from dir 26 to dir 20

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select CLIC908_ID, amount_f3 from :1/clnt inner join :1/CLIC ON (clnt.CLNT102_CLNTNO = clic.CLIC908_CLNTNO) AND (clnt.CLNT101_ADMNO = clic.CLIC908_ADMNO) inner join (select CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO, CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO, cast (sum (CMON_CURRBALSETTLEMENTACC) as decimal (13,2)) as amount_f3 from :1/cmon join :1/clnt on CMON_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO where CMON_YEAR = (select GNRL_ACTIVEYEAR from :1/gnrl) and CMON_MONTH = (select GNRL_ACTIVEMONTH from :1/gnrl) and CMON_CURRENCY = 'PLN' and (CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO = 1 or CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO = 7) group by CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO, CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO having sum(CMON_CURRBALSETTLEMENTACC) > 5000) as CTRLFA on (CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO = CTRLFA.CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO) and (CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO = CTRLFA.CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO)
inner join (select KONTO.CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO, KONTO.CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO from (Select CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO, CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO from :1/cdto inner join :1/clnt on cdto.cdto_admno = CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and cdto.cdto_clntno = CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO group by CLNT.CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO, CLNT.CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO, CDTO_DATE having CDTO_DATE > (select GNRL_ACTIVEDATE from :1/gnrl) - 30 days and sum (CDTO_CURRBALSETTLEMENTACC) > 0 and (CLNT.CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO = 1 or CLNT. CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO = 7)) AS KONTO group by KONTO.CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO, KONTO.CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO having COUNT(KONTO.CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO) > 19) AS KONTO2 on (CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO = KONTO2.CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO) and (CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO = KONTO2.CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO) where (CLNT101_ADMNO = 1 or CLNT101_ADMNO = 7) AND CLIC908_INFS_CODE ='N' and (CLNT101_ADMNO = CLNT.CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO) and (CLNT102_CLNTNO = CLNT.CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO) and (CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 1 or CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 4 or CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 3) and CLNT911_BANKSECRECY = 'N' and CLNT803_CONTRACTTERMDATE > (select GNRL_ACTIVEDATE from :1/gnrl) + 14 days
UNION ALL
select CLIC908_ID, amount_f3 from :1/CLNT inner join :1/CLIC ON (CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO = CLIC.CLIC908_CLNTNO) AND (CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO = CLIC.CLIC908_ADMNO) inner join (select CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO, CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO, cast (sum (CMON_CURRBALSETTLEMENTACC) as decimal (13,2)) as amount_f3 from :1/cmon join :1/clnt on CMON_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO where CMON_YEAR = (select GNRL_ACTIVEYEAR from :1/gnrl) and CMON_MONTH = (select GNRL_ACTIVEMONTH from :1/gnrl) and CMON_CURRENCY = 'PLN' and (CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO = 1 or CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO = 7) group by CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO, CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO having sum( CMON_CURRBALSETTLEMENTACC ) > 3000 ) as CTRLFA on (CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO = CTRLFA.CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO) and (CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO = CTRLFA.CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO) where (CLNT101_ADMNO = 1 or CLNT101_ADMNO = 7) AND CLIC908_INFS_CODE = 'N' and (CLNT101_ADMNO = CLNT.CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO) and (CLNT102_CLNTNO = CLNT.CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO) and (CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 1 or CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 4 or CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 3) and CLNT911_BANKSECRECY = 'N ' and CLNT803_CONTRACTTERMDATE <= (select GNRL_ACTIVEDATE from :1/gnrl) + 14 days
